review: My mom had her teeth extracted and replaced with artificial ones. Had a good experience. My mom is happy with the details care provided by Dr. Sumithra.

Met Dr. Sumi for the process of root canal.
 She is my schoolmate and a good friend of mine. She is a person who always questions about things around us right from childhood. She is a socially responsible person, kind hearted and an expressive person. 
I can see Dr. Sumi still reflecting the same character after so many years, when I approached her for tooth problem. She diagnosed my tooth problem correctly, explained me the cause of occurrence, where disease located, process of treatment,etc. in detail.
She also explained how many sittings for treatment, necessity for the appropriate time gap between each sitting.
She also gave appointment in advance, discussed for comfortable timing, and proceeded further in a very comfortable and a very friendly manner. She performed the treatment on time in the given appointment schedule. 
Clinic was also maintained cleanly with all necessary equipments.
Thank you so much Dr. Sumi for all your timely services inspite of this pandemic situation.

Dentist C.Sumitha was very accommodating even at the last minute call. Recent visit was for Molar (Last big one) Tooth extraction which was crumbling due to decay, half of the crown already gone only part of the crown has the hold and that too can't grabbed tight. Couple of doctors from my native said tough case. 

She assessed my case and considering my travel plans she had performed the procedure (withing 1 hour) with assessment 10min,  break 20m, local sedation  5m, break 5m, extraction 15m, completion and post extraction care in 5mins. 

Premise is also neat and hygienic with adequate amenities for X-Ray, Sanitizing the tools etc.

Charges were unbeatable compared to other doctors even in my town. (Kovilpattti - South TN)

This is my second visit to her. Previous one was Root Canal and Cap. in 3 sitting I guess, couldn't recollect exact flow but that was almost closer to American Dental standards which I got after Insurance coverage. (in US for 15times of the cost what she charged) 

Wish she is located near to my town or at-least come as visiting Doctor to a dental clinic here.

I went to Smita for complex dental fillings and very happy to say she is ************* *** caring. She provided a plan and gave detail on what is going to be done and when to help me to take informed decision on dental fillings. I would like to recommend this clinic. Thank you
